column1: @ChrisVanHollen “I am ready to see senators resume work in the Capitol, but without effective safeguards in place, @senatemajldr is endangering the lives of the staff who work there…undermining regional efforts to prevent the spread of the coronavirus,”

An estimated 70 percent of coronavirus deaths in Minnesota have been linked to long-term-care facilities. In at least six states, these fatalities account for half of all COVID-19 deaths, and according to the World Health Organization

My olives at risk to Xylella virus, my poached eggs at risk to Avian flu, children getting diagnosed with Kawasaki disease/covid linked, and my fellow humans are dying because of the Coronavirus flu. Anyone else wondering what’s around the corner on top of dark recession..
